description: Oleg Sokolov, an expert on Napoleon, was sentenced to 12 and a half years in prison.
title: Russian historian jailed for dismembering partner
title_page: Russian historian jailed for dismembering partner - BBC News
maintext: Sokolov had been living with Ms Yeshchenko for at least three years. He organised Napoleonic re-enactments - in which he played the part of Napoleon and she also took part.
